text: I need to bulk load Parent Company on over 1,000 child companies.  One of the admins is doing this one by one.  She cant access the Parent company via the user interface to do the bulk change.  Anyone have any ideas how to bulk load a companies Parent company?
<@UJJCWR8JU> I'd cross post this to the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel, I am sure someone in there may be able to help you out with a way to do this programmatically
